intro:
A cat cries for a 〇〇!?
Learn Unique Cat Proverbs from Around the World in a Fun Quiz!
description:
This is a quiz game where you can learn rare and fascinating cat-related proverbs from different cultures while enjoying adorable cat photos.

How to Play：
・Read the question carefully.
・Choose the best answer from the four options.
・If you get it right, you’ll see an explanation of what the proverb means!

Pick up some cool, little-known proverbs from around the world—perfect for fun and easy learning!

If you’re stuck, just tap the hint button!
(It gives a huge clue, so use it wisely.)
